caption.p: Quercetin had damaging effects on SGIV particles. GS cells incubated with quercetin-treated SGIV served as the test group, and cells infected with SGIV alone served as the control group. Compared to the control group, the levels of viral MCP (A) and viral envelope protein (B) gene expression in the test groupâ€™s cells were lower than those in the control group. It indicated that quercetin had damaging effects on SGIV particles ( ** p < 0.01).
